result.execSummary:
The defendant Ernest C Castaneda III was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Graffiti, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.017(1).
  • Graffiti, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.017(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: GFE to maintain FTE/schooling and when not fully engaged, must complete 15 hours of community servie per week.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been electronically sent to the probation office.

Counseling as deemed appropriate by agent.  DNA sample.

Case called:  3:29 pm
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Molly Lawrence:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Austin Mort;

INITIAL APPEARANCE:
State makes statement regarding the history of this case.
Parties to proceed with a Plea Hearing at this time.

PLEA HEARING:
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves  

PLEA: 
Ct. 1 (Graffiti)>> NO CONTEST
Ct. 2 (Graffiti)>> NO CONTEST.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/H- 2 years probation on each Count, concurrent. CONDITIONS: Counseling as deemed appropriate by agent, Good faith effort to Maintain Full time work/Full time school and when not fully engaged must complete 15 hours of Community Service per week, Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge. No objection to expungment if Defendant completes probation, paid in full, and no new charges are filed.

Adjourned: 3:37 pm
